hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Umar said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever wears a garment of pride and vanity, Allah will clothe him, on the Day of Resurrection, in a garment of humiliation.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَبِسَ شُهْرَةً مِنَ الثِّيَابِ
chapter.eng-name: One who wears a garment of fame
